animeTitle: Boku wa Robot-goshi no Kimi ni Koi wo Suru Movie
animeDescription: Set in the year 2060, the novel follows a love story as Tokyo's third Olympics draws near. Takeru Oosawa, who works for the AI Robot Technology Research Lab, is chosen as a member of the national secret project using humanoid robots. With the help of childhood friend and co-worker Youichirou Amano and his sister Saki, Takeru tries his best to reach his objectives. However, the situation changes when Saki's office receives a warning note for terrorism.(Source: MAL News)
animeRelated: ['Adaptation: Boku wa Robot-goshi no Kimi ni Koi wo Suru', 'Other: Boku wa Robot-goshi no Kimi ni Koi wo Suru']
